Home







UCI Experts




Our experts are available to respond to media inquiries. Their profiles contain biographical information and media files to help you find the most relevant expert for your needs. You can also search for experts by subject matter by typing in keywords in the search bar below. If you are on deadline, call Tom Vasich, director of media relations at UCI, at 949-285-6455 or email at tmvasich@uci.edu
